column4: HELP!!! i'm in a GNOME without a windowmanager and no possibility to run metacity whatsoever... how do i restore this?
HELP!!! i'm in a GNOME without a windowmanager and no possibility to run metacity whatsoever... how do i restore this?
my lazy half assed way would be to rm -r all my .gconf and .gnome directories and just restart gnome.
but then all configs would be gone and i spent hours fine-tuning my configs
